page.title: 15RESTAURANTS AND PUBS
page.content: There is little entertainment in this rural area apart from that offered by its three public houses. The Carpenters Arm in Thornwood offers its own atmosphere and a juke box. The Blacksmiths Arms has a wide range of hot and-especially-cold food and while prices are not cheap,the food is good and plentiful.For entertainment, the landlord has a room used,one night a week each for Jazz and Country & Western music.There are also singers and the hall is open for bookings for clubs,parties and so on. The other pub,the Bull and Horseshoes in Hastingwood,has no special entertainments,but its large car park suggests a good number of regulars. A 1/6 gill serving of spirits in one of the pubs costs about 65-70p,and the beer 80-90p for a pint.
